definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: I am due for a talking-to after my little bout with the drug store police this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今早跟藥店保安周旋之後，你肯定要找我談話。

sentences.english: So Jack deposits a urine sample in a small jar and takes it to the drugstore.
sentences.chinese: 於是傑克帶着一小瓶尿樣來到了藥店。

sentences.english: That person is certainly in the wrong. is druggist right to do so?
sentences.chinese: 那個人當然是理虧的，那麼藥店老闆做得對嗎？

sentences.english: A friend of ours went to the Huashi Pharmacy, at the Portman, to purchase the inhaler she uses due to asthma.
sentences.chinese: 我們的一個朋友去華氏藥店買哮喘的吸入器。

sentences.english: Oh, I catch a cold and decide to go to drug store.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我有點感冒，去藥店買藥。

sentences.english: Mother and son left. They walked along the street in silence.
sentences.chinese: 母子倆離開藥店，默默地走在街上。

sentences.english: ACan you help me? I’m looking for a pharmacy.
You can get some at the pharmacy across the street.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在對面那條街的藥店買到這種藥。

sentences.english: Lime water may be bought at any druggist's, or easily prepared at home.
sentences.chinese: 石灰水可從藥店購得，不過在家裏配製也很容易。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To provide references for drugstores to launch pharmaceutical care.
sentences.chinese: 爲藥店開展藥學服務提供參考。

sentences.english: Purchase alum from any grocery store or pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 首先從食品雜貨店或者藥店買一些明礬。

sentences.english: During 1886, Holmes came across Dr. E. S.
sentences.chinese: 1886年霍姆斯來到霍爾頓醫生的藥店。

sentences.english: It was a famous drug store, and contained one of the first private telephone booths ever erected.
sentences.chinese: 這是家很有名氣的藥店，裝有私人電話間。

sentences.english: So head out and take note of the nearest supermarket, pharmacy, post office, library, etc.
sentences.chinese: 走出去，記下週圍的超市，藥店，郵局，圖書館等等。

sentences.english: Chinese herbal pharmacies, and traditional massage therapists in the Vancouver telephone book.
sentences.chinese: 中藥店，和傳統的按摩師在溫哥華的電話簿裏。

sentences.english: Today, Tylenol is the No. 1 selling over-the-counter brand in American drugstores.
sentences.chinese: 現在，Tylenol是美國藥店的第一零售品牌。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
